overview: Berlin, Gendarmenmarkt, February 4, 2003, 8:31 pm, subzero temperatures. The Golden Camera awards ceremony. Shortly, Dustin Hoffman will be honored with the lifetime achievement film award. Security guys, professional and amateur photographers, fans: all awaiting his arrival.  A (non-)spectacular documentary take, filmed with a normal digital video apparatus, investigates the human reactions to glamour, the star system and fame.
title: Dustin!
